headline: W.H.O. Seeks  Urgent Action To Develop  Antibiotics
abstract: In two new reports, the global health agency says only government intervention can fix the broken market for new antimicrobial drugs.
lead_paragraph: With the pipeline for new antibiotics slowing to a trickle and bankruptcies driving pharmaceutical companies from the field, the World Health Organization on Friday issued a fresh warning about the global threat of drug-resistant infections.
